title: decryptit
author: decryptit
content: Hey all,Just curious, is anyone interested in exchanging a full testnet BTC to me? TYIA.

comments.author: d3bt3
comments.body: Bet on as many as you want here: https://altquick.com/exchange/market/BitcoinTestnet

comments.author: decryptit
comments.body: Interesting. So it's an auction for testnet btc? How legit is this site?

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: I don't know why you think you need a whole testnet bitcoin, most experiments with testnet can be done with fractions of a bitcoin.Anyway, here's a reliable testnet faucet that will send you a reasonable amount: https://coinfaucet.eu/en/btc-testnet/

comments.author: albert0bsd
comments.body: Why don't use faucets? Some faucets give you some good amounts near 0.01 tbtcI already told you about the n0nce user faucet project: [For Developers] n0nce's Bitcoin Testnet Faucet [~10 tBTC]. If you post your address i can send you some testnet

comments.author: notblox1
comments.body: I am offering free testnet Bitcoin but for large transactions like you want 1 tBTC, I am asking for explanation and purpose why you need this amount.Another request is to return this coins to me when you finish whatever you are doing.If you can respect what I am asking please contact me with more information or write them here publicly.This is my Free Testnet Bitcoins topic in Services: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5278247

comments.author: d3bt3
comments.body: Quote from: decryptit on October 02, 2023, 01:02:08 PMInteresting. So it's an auction for testnet btc? How legit is this site?  Been around for years.  It's mainly an exchange for obscure altcoins, the original announcement is here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5111785.0
